articles.title: ‘SNL’ Roasts Elon Musk for Saying Trump Task Force Workers Will Get No Pay: ‘You Can’t Be Surprised the White African Guy’s First Idea Is Slavery’ - Variety
articles.description: 'Saturday Night Live' focused on Trump's cabinet picks this week, roasting Elon Musk, Matt Gaetz and Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
articles.content: The Weekend Update desk at “Saturday Night Live” devoted its opening to hocking some loogies at Donald Trump’s picks to lead his presidential administration. That list includes billionaire Elon Musk,… [+1924 chars]

articles.title: First U.S. case of deadlier mpox virus strain reported in California - The Washington Post
articles.description: The individual is recovering after traveling from Africa, where an outbreak that has killed hundreds is spreading.
articles.content: A California resident has been infected with the more severe type of mpox virus, the first U.S. case of a virus that has sickened thousands and killed hundreds in an outbreak in central and eastern A… [+224 chars]
